{"id":1157870052,"question_id":3271,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1706319220,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1157870052/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Houses at a Certain Distance I","memory":"45.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] countOfPairs(int n, int x, int y) {\n        int[][] dist = new int[n][n];\n        int[] count = new int[n];\n        \n        boolean same = false;\n        \n        if(x==y)\n            same = true;\n        \n        // count[0] = n-1;\n        // if(!same && Math.abs(x-y)!=1){\n        //     count[0]++;\n        // }\n        \n        dist[x-1][y-1] = 1;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                if(j==i){\n                    continue;\n                }\n                dist[i][j] = Math.min(Math.abs(i-j), Math.min(Math.abs(i-(x-1))+1+Math.abs((y-1)-j), Math.abs(i-(y-1))+1+Math.abs((x-1)-j)));\n                count[dist[i][j]-1]++; \n                // System.out.println(i+\",\"+j+\" =\"+dist[i][j]);\n            }\n        }\n        return count;    \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-houses-at-a-certain-distance-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
